entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
